divs: Sighting DetailsMy brother and I were talking late into the night about various topics when we were doing a divination concerning which constellation to ponder and meditate on. This ended up being Pisces. So we walked out onto our pool deck after being in a pretty meditative mindset and directly above our neighbors house (from there you would be able to see the couch where we were sitting) we saw two star-like lights in a parallel formation which was slightly diagonal from the horizon. It was completely silent outside, and a perfectly clear night. This formation moved into the Pisces constellation which was 60 degrees above the horizon. It moved at a medium pace, and at a steady velocity. The space between the two lights looked fuzzy and seemed interconnected. We immediately went to the backyard to try and see more of this somewhat eerie presence and a meteorite came flying by and then after a few minutes directly above the tip of Pisces a blinking blue light appeared and stayed exactly in its position for nearly 45 minutes. The blinking was not consistent with its intervals; they ranged from split seconds to 30 seconds apart. Again, it did not move. Very interesting. This morning we read the other reports in the area about a boomerang-shaped UFO that were seen lats night, and they sounded very familiar.
Summary: Two star-like lights hovered above our neighbors house and then at medium speed and parallel formation went towards Picses.
trends: There have been 41 other sightings in Fort Myers
There were no other sightings in Fort Myers on or around October 2nd 2011
